actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 6334 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from levy 90 percent of an individual's wages or salary.

summary.text: Exempts from levy under the Internal Revenue Code 90 percent of an individual's wages or salary.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 6334 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from levy 90 percent of an individual's wages or salary.
